name: NodeIteratorTest
description: Unit tests for the NodeIterator class, which iterates over nodes in a document.

methods.name: assertIterates
methods.signature: static <T extends Node> void assertIterates(NodeIterator<T> it, String expected)

methods.name: assertContents
methods.signature: static void assertContents(Element el, String expected)

methods.name: trackSeen
methods.signature: static void trackSeen(Node node, StringBuilder actual)

test_cases.name: canIterateNodes
test_cases.description: Tests the iteration functionality of NodeIterator over nodes in a document.

test_cases.name: hasNextIsPure
test_cases.description: Tests that the hasNext method of NodeIterator is pure and does not alter the state of the iterator.

test_cases.name: iterateSubTree
test_cases.description: Tests the iteration functionality of NodeIterator over a subtree of nodes in a document.

test_cases.name: canRestart
test_cases.description: Tests the restart functionality of NodeIterator to iterate from a new starting point.

test_cases.name: canIterateJustOneSibling
test_cases.description: Tests the iteration functionality of NodeIterator over a single sibling node.

test_cases.name: canIterateFirstEmptySibling
test_cases.description: Tests the iteration functionality of NodeIterator over an empty sibling node.

test_cases.name: canRemoveViaIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the removal functionality of NodeIterator to remove nodes during iteration.

test_cases.name: canRemoveViaNode
test_cases.description: Tests the removal functionality of Node to remove nodes during iteration.

test_cases.name: canReplace
test_cases.description: Tests the replacement functionality of Node to replace nodes during iteration.

test_cases.name: canWrap
test_cases.description: Tests the wrapping functionality of Node to wrap nodes during iteration.

test_cases.name: canFilterForElements
test_cases.description: Tests the filtering functionality of NodeIterator to iterate over only Element nodes.

test_cases.name: canFilterForTextNodes
test_cases.description: Tests the filtering functionality of NodeIterator to iterate over only TextNode nodes.

test_cases.name: canModifyFilteredElements
test_cases.description: Tests the modification functionality of NodeIterator to modify filtered Element nodes.
